This notebook aims to cluster the Brazilian municipalities considering climate indicators with multivariate clustering techniques.

## Packages

```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(arrow)
library(timetk)
library(dtwclust)
library(kableExtra)
library(tictoc)
source("../functions.R")
```

dim(tdengue)
